website_summaries.verdict: A rugged yet lightweight pad that ships with sturdy aluminum pegs to stake it down.
pros: Constructed from rugged 600D fabric with a spring steel frame
Dyed fabric design won't peel or flake
32-inch diameter, which collapses down to under 11 inches
Comes with aluminum stakes and a carry  bag
cons: Some of these develop holes and tears easily
A few buyers report that over time folding it can cause the frame to warp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Drone Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect drone pad for my Mavic Pro. Because the Mavic is so compact and close to the ground, it's easy for grass, gravel, dust and dirt to interfere with its operation. I looked into leg extensions but heard from others that the extensions affect obstacle avoidance and make it hard to fold. I've used this pad at least 100 times and am very happy with it. It has stakes in case of high winds but have never had to stake it as it is sturdy and stays in place. Folding it is very easy. It is good practice to try and land perfectly on the X!
customer_reviews.author: Beej11

customer_reviews.title: better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned this may be too light and about as stable as my windshield type of material with the thin easy to bend wire that runs along the outside, and wow I was wrong in a very good way. When this thing pops out, its solid and tight with a very durable material. The metal ring is very sturdy and while it takes a bit of manipulation to get it back to the folded state, this product turned out to be far better than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Pyro

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pad!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought the smaller one, too small for my Mavic Pro. Liked it so much, nice quality product, decided to buy this larger one. One side note, with it set on the ground, no need to worry about it 'lifting off' and having to be staked down. If it's so windy you need to worry about this pad moving around (let alone blowing away), you're probably not flying your drone anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mavic Pro and P4P!
customer_reviews.text: This is the size to get, unless you need a real miniature one. Stores small enough to carry around easily, but too big for a jacket pocket. Nice design has plenty of contrast for DJI Precision Landing technology and keeps grass and dust/dirt from getting blown or sucked into cooling systems on take-off and landing. The included aluminum hold-down spikes are a nice touch for windy days. Fabric is much heavier and durable than the flimsy nylon used on some portable landing pads. This is a good brand with lots of size options, as well.
customer_reviews.author: FiveFormTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one to replace one that I had lost. This one is very attractive, a bit larger than my previous one. If you haven't used this design, it might take a little practice to twist it back together so you can store in its bag. The bag seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Edwards_CSG

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all drones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for drones! Bought for my new DJI Mavic Pro and it's large enough and has a great pattern for the return to home sensors on my Mavic. It's large enough not to be disturbed by prop wash or light winds. Love the added feature of the included metal stakes to secure it down in grass...just in case some high winds come up. Very portable and folds quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ted K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, keeps drone out of grass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could fly in grass fields. Some times the grass would get wrapped around the prop axis. This fixed the issue, when I can control the drone well enough to fit the target landing zone. This is also easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice colorful item. Works great but over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Like my landing pad. Too pricey as compared to others of similar build. I paid extra for the pattern. Other wise its the same as many at less than half or less. Took six weeks to get to the usa. A lot if flying time in summer is done by then. Would not buy again fir the value.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: If you own a Mavic, you should own a flat hat!
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity of use, coupled with a design that allows an awesome RTH target for my drone ( DJI Platinum Pro ) its landed within the circumference of the pad every time since I’ve used it, and all of this fabricated from a heavy duty material equals an impressive landing pad! Flat hat is the only brand I’ll be using from now on, if I ever need one again!
customer_reviews.author: AxP

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: Mavics have legs just long enough to land on a pool table. Get extensions and you may be able to accommodate an inch or two of grass. This large FlatHat provides a place to land in tallish grass, sand, soft or muddy dirt or rocks. The bag and spikes are useful. There is a trick to folding it back into the bag though.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Thorlin

customer_reviews.title: Great launch pad that's easy to see!
customer_reviews.text: Great launchpad for Phantom 3 / 4 and Yuneec Q500. Works just like my photography bounce reflectors and easily twist up and stores at a third of it's original size. Nice thing about this pad vs a cheap photo reflector is it includes metal stakes to secure to the ground and the high visibility markings are printed very nicely on to the high quality fabric. A must have if you launch in tall grass, dusty or sandy environments.
customer_reviews.author: Charles and Lei

customer_reviews.title: Good drone pad
customer_reviews.text: Folds up in a pretty compact configuration. Provides a nice area for take off and landing.
customer_reviews.author: Telephus53

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my drone had a problem tipping in tall grass. one time the blades hit and flipped the drone. With this I have a level landing pad. The case is nice to store it in and takes little room.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & easily seen from above.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed. Easily seen from above, I also use it to find items on the ground here in the desert that are hard to otherwise see as they blend in with the surroundings. It comes with three small metal stakes that keep it in place. I tried using it without them and the downwash from my Phantom 4 will sometimes moves the pad.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. Herrold

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: My first thought when I took it out of the box was "Man, this thing is really well made!". I like the high contrast pattern and the thick ring that holds it open. If you have a Phamtom drone, any thick grass will cause errors with the gimbal. This solves that problem. I'm very pleased with this landing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Pelt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it will last a while. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected  by far
customer_reviews.text: WOW not sure what I expected but this is just perfect, very well made and comes with a bag plus anodized stakes to secure it. Just give them your money you will very happy with the construction and ease.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It perfect for my DJI Mavic. Easy to carry, set-up, and put away. Ideal for take-offs and landings from grass and dirt that could effect the Mavic. Light, but still heavy enough to stay put under light-wind conditions for flying.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for X-Star Premium Quadcopter
customer_reviews.text: The 32 inch diameter size is just right for Autel's X-Star quadcopter. The three included metal hooks help hold down the pad when placed on grass surface. Good quality fabric. Foldes easily and stored in nice cover.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Twists up to a third of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Twists up to a third of the size to tote around. Fits nicely in my drone case.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Rigd
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to fold but that's good because it want to stay rigid
customer_reviews.author: clayton rough

customer_reviews.title: My drone likes it
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive, but a good product. Makes safe landing easier.
customer_reviews.author: River Easterly

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the fine dust away during take off and landing
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Helps keep the fine dust away during take off and landing. Adequate size for phantom 4 pro and Mavic.
customer_reviews.author: DJCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. The material is tough and it makes a perfectly tight circle when opened. Folds up easily into a small easy to take fabric zippered case.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mavic Pro.
customer_reviews.text: Great landing pad. Quite sturdy. Nice metal pegs to hold in the ground. The contrasting design is great for my DJI Mavic Pro.
customer_reviews.author: L. P

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my husband to use with his drones! Fast, secure shipping, packing; ready to use and easy fold up!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the Mavic Pro, good looking, and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality, very nice carry bag that includes stakes to hold it down on windy days! Highly recommended addition to your fleet.
customer_reviews.author: rotorcraft621

customer_reviews.title: Good small landing pad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pad for my Mavic 2 Pro. Also like the option to a light wire.
customer_reviews.author: Pitmon Foxall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the drone. Doesn't let the rocks and grass get into it.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Keeps my drone clean and clear from dirt and grass.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Phantom 4 Pro knows exactly where to return to home now!
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Hatfield III

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: High quality material, folds easily, very colorful and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: NorthGAQuadPilot

customer_reviews.title: Stay far far away from this piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap!!! I have had this POS just under three weeks and there are already holes along the edges and tears. Stay away from this piece of crap!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SRJ

product_meta.title: FlatHat 32" (80cm) Collapsible Drone Landing Pad
product_meta.description: FlatHat 32" collapsible drone pad is suitable for use with DJI Mavic, DJI Phantom 4, 3, 2, 1, DJI inspire, Parrot Bebop and similarly-sized drones. Contents include (1) 32" FlatHat collapsible drone pad, (3) ground stakes (for windy conditions), (1) fabric carry bag. The FlatHat 32" (80cm) collapsible drone pad is constructed out of durable, heavy-duty fabric sewn to a flexible spring steel frame. Weighing just 13oz (370g) , the 32" drone pad collapses to 1/3 of its expanded size, storing quickly in an included carry bag that fits easily into a backpack or laptop sleeve. The 32" landing pad size is perfect for mid-size consumer drones like the DJI Mavic, Phantom 4, 3, 2, 1, DJI inspire, Parrot Bebop and other similarly sized drones. The drone pad's bold landing pattern provides an easy-to-see target, and the pad can act as a designated 'return-home' location for drones with that capability. Created by ExpoImaging, FlatHat Labs develops cool gear for drone pilots. "Flat hatting" was a term coined by world war II pilots to refer to unauthorized low-level flying and stunting. FlatHat products aim to help drone pilots have more fun while flying. Learn more at flathatlabs.Com.
feature_bullets: Durable, heavy duty 600D fabric sewn to spring steel frame
Light weight design easy to carry - no need to carry extra weight
Dyed fabric will not peel-off or flake with use
Universal compatibility for drones, including DJI Mavic and DJI Phantom Series 4, 3, 2, 1
Includes 32” drone pad, 3 aluminum stakes, high quality carry bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
